Map Object¶

class reamber.base.MapObj.MapObj¶

Bases: abc.ABC

This class should be inherited by all Map Objects

They must inherit the data method, which extracts all data they hold. They are also assumed to be a TimedList.

addOffset(by: float)¶

Move all by a specific ms

abstract data() → Dict[str, reamber.base.lists.TimedList.TimedList]¶

Gets the data as a dictionary

bpms: BpmList¶
notes: NotePkg¶
